phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
As a plan to get a strategic upper hand against the Clover Kingdom,
the Diamond Kingdom attacked the border town of Kiten.
But the Golden Dawn arrived there before anyone else
and faced off with the Diamond army,
quelling the situation.
Wind Magic: Swift White Bow.
I thought I saw a familiar little speck.
What are you doing here, Asta?
The fact that you are so beat up means...
You got stronger again, did not you?
Huh?
I am not losing to you, Asta.
Look who is talking!
You got crazy strong, too, you jerk!
I am not going to lose either, Yuno!
Behind the Mask
Your arm...
Is it okay?
Yeah, I am fine!
See?
No problem at all!
I see.
It looks like you are as reckless as ever.
Y-Yuno's actually smiling?
I think you got a little taller since I last saw you, Yuno.
What the heck?
He always acts apathetic when he is with me!
Oh, yeah.
I might have grown four or five centimeters.
How do you keep getting taller so easily?!
Damn it!
I am not going to lose!
I am going to get 20 centimeters taller by tomorrow and look down on you!
Not a chance.
What are you doing, Yuno?!
Yuno, who the heck is this twerp?!
You are acting all apathetic again!
What the heck is that fussy, mysterious little critter?
Is that the Sylph I have heard so much about?
I have never seen Yuno make that face!
Is this the power of the Sylph?!
Tell me!
Who is this mummified shrimp?!
Hey, you are small, too!
He is a guy I used to live with.
Y-Y-Y-You...
Y-You lived with him?
We would eat together, study together...
Slept in the same bed... and even bathed...?
Sneaky, sneaky, sneaky, sneaky...
YOU-Um...
It is been a while!
Um, thank you so much for saving my meal last time.
All you all better now?
Oh, you are the girl from back then...
From the Black Bulls.
Please enjoy this after-battle snack!
Thanks.
I will even thrown in some extra dragees.
Thanks.
Now who is this insolent child?
She is clearly head over heels for Yuno.
I am Charmy.
May I call you Yuno?
Sure.
This is good.
La, la!
But my Sylph senses are telling me that she does not actually pose a threat.
I am sorry for pushing you down so suddenly back then.
La...
Oh, do not worry about that!
It is just something that did indeed happen!
P-Push... P-Pushed down?!
La?!
Why, you...
You must have used some sneaky spell to seduce Yuno!
You snot-nosed little brat!
La?
What is this creature?
Are you yummy?
Miz Charmy!
She is a spirit!
Do not eat her!
What is with you people?!
Yuno belongs to me, dang it!
Snot-nosed little brat?
I cannot let that slide.
I am nineteen!
I am older than Yuno and rather sophisticated, too!
My sexiness does not need any magical enhancement!
Sexy?!
You are built like a grade-schooler, besides your giant forehead!
La?!
Oh, you did not just go there!
You are also built like a grade-schooler and have a giant forehead!
What did you say?!
I will show you what happens when you cross a Sylph!
You insolent little brat!
I will fry you up and eat you!
Come back here, you little insect!
Calm down, Miz Charmy!
Bell, that is enough.
Hup.
Hey, looks like you are having fun.
Let me join in.
Finral.
Who is that?
This is my senior from the Black Bulls, Finral.
You guys have not met before?
Nope.
It is fine.
Not like I would catch the eye of an elite from the Golden
What is this?
Well, well...
If it is not my big brother.
It is been so long!
I never dreamed I would run into you here.
Langris...
Who is that?
What is the black sheep of our family, who can barely even fight,
even doing on the battlefield?
Finral, who is that rude little twerp?!
He is my little brother.
Huh?
That is the Vice Captain of the Golden Dawn, Langris Vaude.
Golden Dawn Vice Captain Langris Vaude
What?
Vice captain?!
Are you still acting as the Black Bulls' pack mule, Finral?
It looks like I will have to be the next head
of the Vaude family, since you are such a loser.
Get over yourself!
Finral's awesome!
At the Underwater Temple,
it was only because I had Finral's help that we were able to defeat the enemy!
Wow!
You mean you were actually useful for once in your life?
More importantly, how can you talk to your big brother like that, you punk?!
How dare you address the Vice Captain of the Golden Dawn like that?
Wh-What did you say?!
It is okay, Asta.
He is only telling the truth.
But...
It is fine.
We have already cleaned up most of the enemies...
Or rather, our captain dealt with most of them himself.
The Bulls are not needed here anymore.
And anyway...
When did the Black Bulls become a daycare center?
Looking after two children must be rough.
Are not you embarrassed at having to babysit those two rugrats?
Who are you calling a rugrat?!
I will show you the charms of a mature woman!
I am not a little kid, damn it!
Langris, you can insult me to your heart's content.
Hmph.
But... do not you dare insult the members of my Black Bulls!
Wow.
Who knew you could look so scary?
You little brat...
On the honor of the Eight Shining Generals, I am taking your head back home with me!
Oh, dear...
You are still alive?
Not only that, but at this rate,
my spatial magic is going to hit those civilians.
You cannot lay a finger on me, Magic Knights!
Save us!
I do not have time to hesitate.
Oh, well.
They will just have to be noble sacrifices for the sake of our country.
Hold it!
How can you even think about abandoning our citizens?!
We are Magic Knights!
And if this goes on, we will just end up with even more victims!
Shut up!
I am not going to abandon anyone!
Finral!
Miz Charmy!
Right!
Roger!
Just you watch, Yuno!
Let us see what you have got.
What can you possibly do in the condition you are in?
Talk about a lively retreat...
Cotton Creation Magic: Fluffy Sheep Cushion!
Who the hell are you?!
Stay out of this, brat!
Spatial magic?
Wh-What?!
My magic disappeared!
What did you do, you brat?!
Looks like I owe you one, Yuno.
Your fighting style's as insane as ever, Asta.
Yuno's smiling again!
Hmph!
Langris...
You are right.
I cannot beat you.
But...
The Black Bulls will beat the Golden Dawn!
Yeah!
Man, your world tree magic is as impressive as ever.
Exactly what are you trying to say?
I am someone who believes his gut instincts.
Vangeance...
Could you take off that mask?
Vangeance...
Could you take off that mask?
This is not a face that most people would want to see.
What?
Are you, like, super ugly under there or something?
Do not worry.
I promise I will not laugh.
I know what this is, Yami.
You suspect that I may be the leader of the Eye of the Midnight Sun, do not you?
Frankly, yeah.
His light magic and your world tree magic are obviously different,
but something is really bugging me.
Their builds, their voices, and more than anything, their ki feels the same.
But...
I think it is been about ten years since I first met you.
Indeed.
We met on the battlefield, and after that, we fought together from time to time.
Then we became captains at the same time.
Nozel's braid shook like crazy when that happened.
It is not like we are best buds or anything,
but we go back pretty far, do not we?
I feel something similar in you...
So just let me see your face, all right?
Very well.
That is one hell of a scar.
Did you get it on the battlefield?
No, I was born with it.
They called me a cursed child.
A cursed child?
Even magic could not fix this scar.
It creeped out the people around me, and they came to fear me.
I was the illegitimate child of a certain noble.
I lived in the Forsaken Realm until I was eight.
But following the loss of that noble's heir, I was taken in as an aristocrat.
Fortunately, I had great magical power, and my world tree magic was viewed with awe.
But even there, they loathed my face.
In addition, my foster mother brutally abused me.
It was a hellish childhood.
You sure had it rough, did not you?
But in the midst of all that, I met Master Julius.
He did not care about my appearance.
All he saw was my power.
Little boy, what kind of magic is that?
I-It is world tree magic, sir.
World tree magic?!
How sublime and majestic!
That is terrific!
Most of all...
It is as though your kindness is trying to protect everything.
What wonderful magic!
You should definitely join the Magic Knights!
Do you not want to?
N-No!
I would love to...
I never even thought about joining the Magic Knights.
But my face...
It is nothing to worry about.
Huh?
It really is nothing to worry about, but if you are so worried about it...
In that case...
I will give you this mask!
Master Julius, this is so... tacky.
What?!
But it is my best work!
I was happy.
I wanted to pledge my grimoire to his service.
This story sounds pretty familiar.
The lines of his face also look like Licht's.
But I cannot sense the slightest trace of magic from his scar.
He does not seem to be doing anything tricky with magic or showing me an illusion.
And more than anything...
His ki tells me he is not lying.
I guess this was just some odd coincidence.
Sorry about that.
No...
I am glad I was able to tell you and show you things as they really are.
Thank you, Yami.
I see.
Captain Vangeance!
Captain Vangeance!
The Diamonds have begun to retreat.
Understood.
There is no need to pursue those who are fleeing.
Could you concentrate on helping the injured?
Understood, sir.
Shall we go, too?
There are plenty of captives.
It is going to be a pain transporting them all.
Yeah.
Oh, if we are transporting captives, I brought some useful guys along.
Let us work'them to the bone.
Within reason, of course.
I wonder if a cute girl is talking about me.
Looks like the fighting has calmed down, so why do not we meet up with Yami?
Good idea.
La?!
Already?
Well, see ya, Yuno.
Yeah, see you, Asta.
Do not eat stuff you find lying on the ground.
Like I would do that!
I mean, I used to, but...
Um, c-could I maybe ask for your address?
Stay away from Yuno, you thieving raccoon!
Your scales are getting in my eyes!
I am going to fry you up!
Come back here!
Get away from me!
You little insect!
La?
I know it is too late to take it back now,
but the worst squad just picked a fight with the best squad!
Does your stomach hurt, Finral?
I want to hurry up and practice with my sword!
I wanted to talk with Yuno more!
I am going to eat my sorrows away!
You guys are way too laid-back!
I mean, I am the one who picked the fight, but...
Now, now.
Here, eat this.
Nomity noms.
Hey, it is good.
Honestly, what a vulgar bunch.
You should be more careful about who you associate with, Yuno.
Are not you embarrassed to be seen with them?
Why?
I have never thought that, not even once.
I am proud of Asta, and he is my rival.
Rival?
That guy?
Rival in what?
Are you guys competing for something?
Yeah...
By the way, Asta, was it okay to just leave so abruptly like that?
That handsome guy is your old friend, is not he?
It is fine!
We will meet on some other battlefield, anyway.
Because...
The Wizard King?!
You really are not embarrassed to say that at all, are you?!
Maybe you peasants do not even feel embarrassment.
I would expect no less from the great peasant who was chosen by the four-leaf grimoire!
What is your problem?!
I will not allow you to make fun of Yuno
There is no rule that says commoners cannot become the Wizard King.
Huh?
So first, I will become the Captain of the Golden Dawn.
I see.
Meaning you are completely ignoring my existence as vice captain.
Yuno, things are taken care of over here.
All the wounded are taken care of, too.
What in the world happened?
The Diamond forces have retreated, and we have taken a number of captives.
Kiten was successfully defended.
Excellent work.
Please see to the repair of the damaged buildings
and set up shelters immediately.
Yes, sir.
Now, then...
I do not think that was
a serious attempt by the Diamonds to invade our kingdom.
So what were they after?
I see...
The Sylph, eh?
Offensive spatial magic...
Oh, and world tree magic that uses others' magic.
I guess the rusty old generals of the previous era had their useful moments,
but from here on out, this era belongs
to us Mage Warriors, the new generals!
Petit Clover!
Together!
T-Together!
Is that the Sylph I have heard so much about?
I have never seen Yuno make that face!
Is this the power of the Sylph?!
He is a guy I used to live with.
What?!
You cannot be serious.
You guys slept together?!
Asta, hey.
You cannot be serious...
You guys ate together?!
Go!
You cannot be serious...
You guys bathed together?!
What is wrong with her?
No idea.
Thank goodness.
I did not know what I was going to do if Vangeance
was actually Licht from the Eye of the Midnight Sun.
Black Clover, Page 54: Never Again.
Page 54 Never Again
I know.
I will get him a hyottoko mask from my homeland.
